actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the age requirement for eligibility for the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the age requirement for eligibility for the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence by an individual.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the age requirement for eligibility for the one-time exclusion of gain from the sale of a principal residence.
